name: Bhief
description:
Buniverse, where every meaningful word, starts with a 'B'.

Join Bhief in his endeavor to get revenge on those who had him Bexcommunicated from The Holy Burch.

The Holy Burch has control all over the Bouthern Lands, destroy the reputation of these said heretics and expose their lies said in the name of Besus Brist who are tarnishing his Holy like existence.


Please note, you need to defeat the Hunters to progress in the game.


Controls

  • WASD/ ARROW KEYS - Move

  • SPACEBAR - Interact with (Press)  or (Hold) .

  • R - Restart (Hold for 2 seconds) if any problems with the current game scenario.

  • Esc - Pause the game.

Rules

  • Earn Fame by Luring  and others just like it to .

  • They will follow you but avoid you as well. Use that knowledge to lure them more efficiently. Go too far and they wont follow you. 

  • Herd them like sheeps!

  • After certain amount of fame is gained, a Hunter  will spawn to defame you and ultimately Bexecute you. Each hunter has different health, denoted by bars on the sprite itself.

  • Take the help of  by hiring them with 50 fame, using 'Space' to drop  like mines to damage, these said hunters. 

  • With each hunter's death, they will get faster and deadlier!

  • Defeat these said hunters to win the game!

  • Also, if you got negative fame, you lose. :(


Due to unavailability of time I couldn't fix the overlapping of spawned objects. Please restart by holding 'R' key. Apologise for any inconvienice.

This is a submission made to Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

All Graphical assets and scripts are developed by Siddhant Rathor.

Music by - Freesound.org, Chosic.com, Kenney assets

NOTE For anyone having problems with reading the font, these both characters are Capital 'S' and small 's' respectively.
